alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 20 at 8:50AM CDT until July 20 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MDT /3 PM CDT/ THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... The National Weather Service in Goodland has expanded the * Flood Watch to include portions of northwest Kansas and southwest Nebraska, including the following areas, in northwest Kansas, Decatur, Rawlins, and Sheridan. In southwest Nebraska, Dundy, Hitchcock, and Red Willow. * From 2 PM MDT /3 PM CDT/ this afternoon through late tonight * WHEN...From 2 PM MDT /3 PM CDT/ this afternoon through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
